arrow.description: Whether or not to display an arrow, including the configuration that points to the center of the element
arrow.description_zh: 是否显示箭头，包含是否指向元素中心的配置

placement.description: The position of the bootstrap card relative to the target element
placement.description_zh: 引导卡片相对于目标元素的位置

mask.description: Whether or not to enable the mask, you can also pass in the configuration to change the mask style and fill color
mask.description_zh: 是否启用蒙层，也可传入配置改变蒙层样式和填充色

type.description: Type, which affects the base color and text color
type.description_zh: 类型，影响底色与文字颜色

current(v-model).description: What step is it currently at

scrollIntoViewOptions.description: Whether to support the current element to scroll into the window, you can also specify the relevant parameters of the scrolling window
scrollIntoViewOptions.description_zh: 是否支持当前元素滚动到视窗内，也可传入配置指定滚动视窗的相关参数
